00019 #ifndef _IPL98_ARRAY2DIT_H
00020 #define _IPL98_ARRAY2DIT_H
00021 
00022 #include "../ipl98_types.h"
00023 #include<iostream>
00024 #include<valarray>
00025 #include<algorithm>
00026 
00027 namespace ipl{ // use namespace if C++
00028 
00029 using std::slice;
00030 using std::valarray;
00031 
00046 template<class T>
00047 class CArray2DIterator
00048 {
00049 protected: // attributes
00050     valarray<T>* m_pData;
00051     slice m_s;
00052     UINT32 m_Curr;    // index of current element
00053 public:
00055         CArray2DIterator(valarray<T>* vv, slice ss) :m_pData(vv), m_s(ss), m_Curr(0) { }
00057         inline CArray2DIterator& operator=(const CArray2DIterator& It);
00060         inline CArray2DIterator End() const;
00062         inline CArray2DIterator& operator++() { m_Curr++; return *this; }
00064         inline CArray2DIterator operator++(int) { CArray2DIterator t = *this; m_Curr++; return t; }
00066         inline T& operator*(){return (*m_pData)[m_s.start()+m_Curr*m_s.stride()];}
00068         virtual inline T& operator[](UINT32 i) {return (*m_pData)[m_s.start()+i*m_s.stride()];}
00071         friend bool operator==(const CArray2DIterator& p, const CArray2DIterator& q);
00074         friend bool operator!=(const CArray2DIterator& p, const CArray2DIterator& q);
00077         friend bool operator< (const CArray2DIterator& p, const CArray2DIterator& q);
00078 };
00079 
00080 
00081 template<class T>
00082 inline CArray2DIterator<T>& CArray2DIterator<T>::operator=(const CArray2DIterator<T>& It)
00083 {
00084         m_pData=It.m_pData;
00085         m_s=It.m_s;
00086         m_Curr=It.m_Curr;
00087         return *this;
00088 }
00089 
00090 template<class T>
00091 inline CArray2DIterator<T> CArray2DIterator<T>::End() const
00092 {
00093         CArray2DIterator<T> t = *this;
00094         t.m_Curr = m_s.size();      // index of last-plus-one element
00095         return t;
00096 }
00097 
00098 template<class T>
00099 bool operator==(const CArray2DIterator<T>& p, const CArray2DIterator<T>& q)
00100 {
00101         return p.m_Curr==q.m_Curr
00102                 && p.m_s.stride()==q.m_s.stride()
00103                 && p.m_s.start()==q.m_s.start();
00104 }
00105 
00106 template<class T>
00107 bool operator!=(const CArray2DIterator<T>& p, const CArray2DIterator<T>& q)
00108 {
00109         return !(p==q);
00110 }
00111 
00112 template<class T>
00113 bool operator<(const CArray2DIterator<T>& p, const CArray2DIterator<T>& q)
00114 {
00115         return p.m_Curr<q.m_Curr
00116                 && p.m_s.stride()==q.m_s.stride()
00117                 && p.m_s.start()==q.m_s.start();
00118 }
00119 
00120 } // end namespace ipl
00121 
00122 #endif //_IPL98_ARRAY2DIT_H
